Tags API

标签的增、删、改、查

获取单个标签信息

GET /api/v1/tags/:id

Parameters

Name Description
id 标签id

Response Fields

Name Description
data[id] id
data[user_id] 用户id
data[name] 标签名
data[category] 标签类型，可能的值有："expenses"、"income"
data[deleted] 是否删除
data[emoji] 标签符号
data[created_at] 创建时间
data[deleted_at] 删除时间
data[updated_at] 更新时间时间

Request

Headers

Version: HTTP/1.0
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjozMzQsImV4cCI6MTY2MzMxMjIwMn0.Ep2JVCpsEDP8Adaeh8i6uSQaWDiwtVax72a8DpuENfU
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json
Host: example.org
Cookie:

Route

GET /api/v1/tags/660

Response

Headers

X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-XSS-Protection: 0
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Download-Options: noopen
X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none
Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Vary: Accept, Accept-Encoding, Origin
ETag: W/"10348460e12cc832b7f01f66d1fdd224"
Cache-Control: max-age=0, private, must-revalidate

X-Runtime: 0.003300
Content-Length: 243

Status

200 OK
